Review contains the literature review.  

Articles presently links to Abstracts. In a feature version Articles will contain the full text articles used (to the extent that those are open access).  

Abstracts contains a collections of abstracts (and keywords) of 38 items identified via the literature searches.  

Searches presently links to Abstracts. In a future version Searches will contain the search strings and the results of the performed database searches.  

Scripts contains the scripts used for merging the bibliographic data from the different sources.
